ISSUE.TITLE: Rename "Edit" order button
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The order list page in admin area. The last column name is "View" but the button name below is "Edit". It's confusing. Let's rename the button name to "View" (also the icon should updated accordingly) Like we already do on other pages such as "Discount details page" ("history" tab), etc

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge branch 'issue-3652-Upgrade-to-.NET-Core-3.1' into develop # Conflicts: # upgradescripts/4.20-4.30 (under development)/upgrade.sql

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4335 Renamed "Edit" to "View" for orders in admin area
